document_name: Decree of March 14, 2016 validating the "Adverse" program within the framework of the system of energy savings certificates
document_description: The Advenir program was created in March 2016. It seeks to facilitates the installation and the partial financing of smart charging points for electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles, beyond public roads and individual housing.The order of December 2021 extends the program's existence to 2025 and sets new funds and targets of new charging points.
